snippet: Can you calculate the number of weekends a college student must tap dance in subways to pay his out-of-pocket expenses, if given the amount he needs, how much he makes dancing per day and the transportation expense to and from college?
abstract: Can you calculate the number of weekends a college student must tap dance in subways to pay his out-of-pocket expenses, if given the amount he needs, how much he makes dancing per day and the transportation expense to and from college?
